sip_features.sip_feature:
HTML

RTL Updates:

HSDs:
1. 1406270159:"FWD (PCR) TGL clock gating enhancement - IOSF SBR - sequential repeater for SBR - use ISM status to explicitly clock gate (or use as enable) for staging of non-control state (payload, eom), to save the dynamic power when ISM idle"
2. 1407454484:"SBR: uprev the dfx_secure_plugin subIP to latest version, DFx_Secure_Plugin_PIC__2018WW12__RTL1P0__PIC5_V1"
3. 1407454556:"SBR: uprev the sTAP subIP to latest version, DFx_sTAP_PIC__2018WW12__RTL1P0__PIC5_V1"
4. 1407527412:"FWD (PCR) [ADL-DFX] IP to support Secure Policy9 and Policy10 in TAP DFX Secure Plugins for FuSa testing and debug"
5. 2203421104:"FWD clock gating enhancement SBR - IOSF SBCPORT - use ISM status to explicitly clock gate (or use as enable) for staging of (payload, eom) state"
6. 1405328857:"TFM: SBR Lintra OpenLatch"
7. 1406716305:"FWD (PCR) [SIIP] [TFM] IPs compliant to CTECH 3.0"
8. 1406917604:"FWD (PCR) request to deliver sideband configurable repeater flop"
9. 1407066618:"FWD (PCR) [Security] Red Revolution VISA signals â€“ SBR"
10. 1407277888:"FWD (PCR) [SBR] - Request for VISA4 RTL Modules and Implement CRs read Capability and Snapshot Feature"
11. 1407277903:"FWD (PCR) [SBR] IP Should Expose the visa_bypass_cr_out port of the Top ULM"
12. 1407278470:"FWD (PCR) SB router needs to update the existing Accum IP"
13. 1407808917:"FWD (PCR) Enable GLS on SBR"
14. 1407991966:"FWD TE pin of clock gater in par_psf0 dfx_accum logic tied to ground"
15. 1407610395:"FWD (PCR) SBR IPGEN - fabric compiler script fixes for Wave3 scaling"
16. 1506780110:"FWD [EBG][SBR] Lintra rule 70612 found in SBR"
17. 2201973384:"FWD TGL SBR lintra rule 60073, 60706 and 70023"
18. 2202290970:"FWD SBR - usage of DEFINE global macros that are NOT part of the Intel converged macro list"
19. 1407280813:"TFM - FWD FWD: 0P3 GPSB sbr_parity_err RTL MCO"

sip_speccons.sip_speccon:
HTML

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable CTECH library when synthesising the IP.

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable/behavior CTECH library when simulating the IP.

sip_specins.sip_specin:
HTML

This SBR release uses the "IOSF_SVC_2018WW38" version of SVC in IRR with constraints on hierarchical headers insertion.

For support file an HSD at SIP HSD

The Zircon scores are uploaded to the IPDS dashboard for the SBR IP at Zircon Scores
